actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A bill to amend the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 with respect to Cuba.

summary.text: Removes the sanction against Cuba which directs the President to assure that no contribution to the United Nations Development Program will be used for projects in Cuba so long as Cuba is governed by the Castro regime. Removes the general prohibition against furnishing assistance to Cuba. Repeals additional economic sanctions against Cuba contained in specified Acts of Congress and specified administrative regulations.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 with respect to Cuba.
